Contact Details for Jacob Rees-Mogg
If you wish to contact Jacob about a media opportunity, please email mbrewerpa@gmail.com.
If you wish to contact Jacob regarding his GBNews programme, please email mailmogg@gbnews.com.
If you wish to contact Jacob regarding his Substack, this can be done from within the Substack website or app.

top of page
Jacob Rees-Mogg
Welcome to my website and thank you for visiting.
I have recently launched a Substack. You can access it here.
Substack is an online platform where I will be writing weekly articles on the current political situation. There will also be monthly articles on topics such as the constitution, US Politics and significant historical figures. Some articles will be freely available and some will only be available to paid subscribers. I hope you will want to join me.
bottom of page

Jacob was born in May 1969 and is married to Helena with whom he has six children. He was educated at Eton before reading History at Trinity College Oxford; he then moved into finance being based in Hong Kong and later moving back to London. He set up his own company in 2007 with a group of Partners; it was called Somerset Capital Management (SCM) and specialised in investment management in global emerging markets for institutional clients.
Jacob was the Member of Parliament for North East Somerset from 2010 to 2024. In 2019 he was appointed Leader of the House of Commons and Lord President of the Council, a post he held for two and a half years under Boris Johnson. He was then the Minister for Brexit Opportunities and Government Efficiency before serving as Secretary of State for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy in Liz Truss' administration. Jacob lost his seat in the 2024 election.
Jacob now presents 'State of the Nation' on GBNews, which runs from Monday to Thursday from 8-9pm. He also writes a regular Substack, which can be accessed at letters.jacobreesmogg.com.
